BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: DEPARTMENT OF ILLINOIS VETERANS OF FOREI

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THIS ORGANIZATION SHALL BE FRATERNAL, PATRIOTIC, HISTORICAL, AND EDUCATIONAL; TO PRESERVE AND STRENGTHEN COMRADESHIP AMOUNG ITS MEMBERS; TO ASSIST WORTHY COMRADES; TO PERPETUATE THE MEMORY AND HISTORY OF THE DEAD; AND TO ASSIST THEIR WIDOWS AND ORPHANS
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THIS ORGANIZATION SHALL BE FRATERNAL, PATRIOTIC, HISTORICAL, AND EDUCATIONAL; TO PRESERVE AND STRENGTHEN COMRADESHIP AMOUNG ITS MEMBERS; TO ASSIST WORTHY COMRADES; TO PERPETUATE THE MEMORY AND HISTORY OF THE DEAD; AND TO ASSIST THEIR WIDOWS AND ORPHANS.
IRS990.Desc: THE ILLINOIS DEPARTMENT PROVIDES SERVICES TO VETERANS THROUGH A VETERANS SERVICE OFFICE. THE SERVICE OFFICE IS CO-LOCATED WITH THE VA REGIONAL OFFICE IN CHICAGO. THE SERVICE OFFICE WORKS TOGETHER WITH FIELD OFFICES OF THE ILLINOIS DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS, COUNTY VETERANS ASSISTANCE COMMISSIONS THROUGHOUT THE STATE AND VFW POST SERVICE OFFICERS TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE AND ADVICE TO VETERANS AND THEIR FAMILIES.SERVICES PROVIDED BY THE SERVICE OFFICE ARE AVAILABLE TO ALL VETERANS, THEIR DEPENDENTS AND SURVIVORS WITHOUT REGARD TO ORGANIZATION MEMBERSHIP STATUS OR ERA OF SERVICE. SERVICES ARE PROVIDED AT NO COST.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE ILLINOIS DEPARTMENT PROVIDES MEMBERSHIP SERVICES TO VETERANS BY HOLDING AN ANNUAL CONVENTION, INITIATING COMMUNITY SERVICE ACTIVITIES, PROVIDING RECOGNITION AWARDS, OFFERING REMEMBERANCE SERVICES, AND ISSUING A QUARTERLY NEWSPAPER.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THE ILLINOIS DEPARTMENT SUPPORTS THE VOICE OF DEMOCRACY YOUTH ACTIVITY PROGRAM. THE VOICE OF DEMOCRACY PROGRAM PROVIDES HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS WITH THE OPPORTUNITY TO EXPRESS THEMSELVES IN REGARDS TO A DEMOCRATIC AND PATRIOTIC-THEMED ESSAY. ESSAYS ARE THEN CHOSEN FOR SPECIAL RECOGNITION VIA AN AWARDS BANQUET AND SCHOLARSHIPS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE SET ASIDE TO PROVIDE BENEFITS FOR THE VOICE OF DEMOCRACY PROGRAM. THE VOICE OF DEMOCRACY PROGRAM IS A PROGRAM PROVIDING SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS.

THE ORGANIZATION HAS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS THE EFFECTS OF ALL TAX POSITIONS AND CONTINUALLY EVALUATES EXPIRING STATUTES OF LIMITATIONS, AUDITS, CHANGES IN TAX LAW, AND NEW AUTHORITATIVE RULINGS. THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT AWARE OF ANY CIRCUMSTANCES OR EVENTS THAT MAKE IT REASONABLY POSSIBLE THAT UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS MAY INCREASE OR DECREASE WITHIN 12 MONTHS OF THE STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION DATE.

RENTAL EXPENSES NETTED WITH RENTAL INCOME ON PART VIII -11,069. COSTS OF GOODS SOLD -26,789. DIRECT EXPENSES FROM GAMING ACTIVITIES -46,440. DONATIONS EXPENSES NETTED WITH CONTRIBUTIONS INCOME ON PART VIII -66,275.

RENTAL EXPENSES INCLUDED WITH RENTAL INCOME IN PART VIII 11,069. COSTS OF GOODS SOLD 26,789. DIRECT EXPENSES FROM GAMING ACTIVITIES 46,440. DONATIONS EXPENSES INCLUDED WITH CONTRIBUTIONS INCOME ON PART VIII 66,275.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: ASSISTANCE IN SUPPORT OF YOUTH ACTIVITIES FOR INDIVIDUALS IN MIDDLE SCHOOL
ASSISTANCE PROVIDED TO VETERANS IN HOSPITALS AND NURSING HOMES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES SCHOLARSHIPS TO HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS TO BE USED FOR EDUCATION. THE ORGANIZATION WILL RECEIVE INFORMATION FROM THE STUDENTS AS TO THE INTENDED USE OF THE FUNDS. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO VETERANS. ASSISTANCE PROVIDED TO VETERANS IS MONITORED THROUGH THE COMPLETION OF EXPENSE REPORTS SPECIFYING THE ASSISTANCE GIVEN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DEPARTMENT IS MADE UP OF MEMBERS FROM THE STATE OF ILLINOIS AS DESIGNATED BY THE NATIONAL BY-LAWS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MEMBERS ELECT THE COUNCIL OF ADMINISTRATION AT THE DEPARTMENT CONVENTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S ULTIMATE AUTHORITY IS CONTAINED IN THE NATIONAL CONVENTION, AS STATED IN THE ORGANIZATION'S CONSTITUTION. IN ADDITION, THE ORGANIZATION'S AUTHORITY IS ALSO CONTROLLED BY THE STATE CONVENTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW BY THE COUNCIL OF ADMINISTRATION DURING A REGULARLY SCHEDULED MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH YEAR, A COUNCIL OF ADMINISTRATION IS ELECTED FROM THE ANNUAL CONVENTION. EACH MEMBER OF THE COUNCIL OF ADMINISTRATION COMPLETES A CODE OF ETHICS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE, AND THE COMPLETED FORMS ARE MAINTAINED BY THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DEPARTMENT WILL PROVIDE ACCESS TO GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND/OR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN THE PROCESS FROM PRIOR YEAR.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: VETERANS OF FOREIGN WARS OF THE UNITED STATES

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: SUPPORT OF CIVIC AND COMMUNITY ACTIONS RELATED TO VETERANS

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: DEPARTMENT OF ILLINOIS VETERANS OF FOREIGN WARS OF THE US

OtherOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: VETERANS OF FOREIGN WARS OF THE UNITED STATES
